name: Bingo Gems: Online Casino Game
summary:
Bingo is one of the most popular and easiest game played by millions of people all over the world today. It is also known as Housie and Tambola. In Italy, it is called lotto. In Paris, the game was also known as Le Lotto.

This is played in other countries like France, Great Britain and other parts of Europe. Bingo originates from the Italian lottery, Il Gioco del Lotto d'Italia. T

The objective of the Bingo gems is to mark 5 numbers up or down, across or diagonally and call “Bingo” faster than the opponents. 

This is a game played on cards, which contain 25 squares arranged in five vertical columns and five side to side rows. Each space in the grid contains a number. 

A classic Bingo gems game uses the numbers list starting from 1 to 75. This list displays the called out numbers. And also five columns of the card are represented by letters B, I, N, G and O from left to right. The centre space is usually marked as a Free Space, and is filled already in all the cards. The range of printed numbers that can appear on the card is normally restricted by column, with the 'B' column only containing numbers between 1 and 15 inclusive, the 'I' column containing only 16 through 30, 'N' containing 31 through 45, 'G' containing 46 through 60, and 'O' containing 61 through 75.

Each player try to match the numbers rolled/drawn at random with numbers on a card. When any player completes marking, any row/column/diagonal/corners, they call BINGO! or HOUSIE!. The first player to call Bingo will be the Winner.

The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential by keeping eye on the numbers are the keys that will unlock the door to excellence to increase your competency and speed. 
Happiness is playing Bingo gems..!!!
